title: Sleeping With My Boss
description: This steamy workplace romance story is full of white-hot passion: drunken Vegas hookups, heated glances between a boss and his sexy employee, and a love that blooms in the most unexpected place...What he says goes.So says the captain of the yacht on my summer internship, anyway.But he and I share a secret: we hooked up in Vegas.Tall, dark, and handsome, he is easily the hottest guy I’ve ever seen.But in the cold light of day, he demands to keep our fling a secret. That’s the thing about passion and secrets, though…Put enough pressure on any situation and it’s bound to explode.And the way he looks at me when he thinks I’m not paying attention?It makes me feel as hot as the sun on a humid summer day.I fantasize about his lips on mine. And when he has a moment of weakness…I’m there, fanning the flames, making him bend to my will.Soon the captain takes control of me… of my body...He drives me wild with passion every time we can sneak away.A breathless love begins to grow between us.But will I ever be more than just an employee to him?Get ready for Gabriel and Luna to take your breath away!
author: Vivian Wood
